EmailTemplate.name: ISO Paper Campaign EM-2.White-Space-Paper-EM2
EmailTemplate.subject: New pricing plans available
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
I just wanted to follow up – did you have a chance to think about updating your price plan to get better pricing on paper? By making the switch, you’d get access to 99115 Grand & Toy Paper for $37.10 or OX9001 Boise paper at $42.90 along with other benefits. You can compare these two plans here <[[https://go.grandandtoy.com/Paper-Campaign.html]]>.
If you need more information or have any questions, please feel free to contact me.
Kind Regards,
